# Semi-Automatic Dough Divider/Rounder

Product Summary

#625-NP  
Divide and round dough in one machine with consistent portion sizes

Semi-Automatic Dough Divider-Rounder Spec Sheet

Bakery Equipment Catalog

Request Pricing

X

Key Features

Product Specifications

Key Features

### Product Features

  * Simply and quickly divide and round dough for rolls, breads, buns, pizza, tortillas
  * Four machines in one with interchangeable dividing head assemblies
  * Interchangeable dividing heads: 
    * Round: 6, 9, 18 or 36 parts
    * Square: 9 parts
    * Choose up to three dividing heads
  * Finished dough ranges from 1 oz. to 26 oz.
  * Create up to 5,000 divided dough balls per hour
  * Quick & easy to change dividing heads, no tools required
  * Standard unit includes a 36-part dividing head and two dough paddles
  * Optional customization with 6, 9 or 18-part dividing heads
  * Dividing heads are dishwasher-safe
  * 1-year warranty
  * NSF certified
  * UL listed in US and Canada
  * Made in USA

### Product Benefits

  * Eliminate the fatigue of hand dividing and improve portion control
  * Use interchangeable dividing heads on one machine for maximum processing flexibility
  * Being simple to operate makes it easy to cross-train employees

Product Specifications

#625-NP Divide and round dough in one machine with consistent portion sizes

  * Product Details 
  * Product Specifications 

## Product Details

### Product Features

  * Simply and quickly divide and round dough for rolls, breads, buns, pizza, tortillas
  * Four machines in one with interchangeable dividing head assemblies
  * Interchangeable dividing heads: 
    * Round: 6, 9, 18 or 36 parts
    * Square: 9 parts
    * Choose up to three dividing heads
  * Finished dough ranges from 1 oz. to 26 oz.
  * Create up to 5,000 divided dough balls per hour
  * Quick & easy to change dividing heads, no tools required
  * Standard unit includes a 36-part dividing head and two dough paddles
  * Optional customization with 6, 9 or 18-part dividing heads
  * Dividing heads are dishwasher-safe
  * 1-year warranty
  * NSF certified
  * UL listed in US and Canada
  * Made in USA

### Product Benefits

  * Eliminate the fatigue of hand dividing and improve portion control
  * Use interchangeable dividing heads on one machine for maximum processing flexibility
  * Being simple to operate makes it easy to cross-train employees

## Product Specifications

Model |

625-NP  
  
---|---  
Dough Capacity |

Minimum portion size: 2 lbs. 4 oz. dough ball  
Maximum portion size: 10 lbs. 2 oz. dough ball  
  
Finished Portion Sizes |

6 part: 19-26 oz.  
9 part: 7-18 oz.  
18 part: 2-7 oz.  
36 part: 1-2.75 oz.  
  
Dimensions |

26.82" L x 80.25" W x 80.25" H  
Height measured from top of handle in upright position  
Depressed handle extends length of machine use range to 31"  
  
Electrical |

208 VAC, 10 amps, 60 Hz, 3 phase  
Special electrics available  
  
Weight |

Machine Weight: 449 lbs.  
Shipping Weight: 495 lbs.  
  
Options |

Round dividing heads: 6, 9, 18 or 36 part  
  
Warranty |

1-year warranty
